data.text: Mlonje malumbo kwa Mkulu Nguluwi, kwa vila ka yanojile,
Wanhu wa Isilaeli walonje,
Walelwa wa Aluni, watambika, walonje,
Weng'ha walingumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi walonje,
Kuli magazo ga heni nandimlanda Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mkulu Nguluwi ka hamwe na heni, silingudumba chinhu,
Mkulu Nguluwi ka hamwe na heni, kunhanza,
Fola kubilimila kikala goya kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Fola kubilimila kikala goya kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Wanhu wa isi zeng'ha nawanzunguluta,
Nawanzunguluta chila ubanzi,
Nawanzunguluta, wenji kota nzuchi,
Nang'hundujizwa kumbele habehi kugwa,
Mkulu Nguluwi ka mong'ho wa heni ukulu,
Lizi lya usangalalo wa kusumya lyanguhulikwa kuli ihema lya hewo watanganiche,
Moko wa kudilo wa Mkulu Nguluwi nawinuligwa kuli kusumya.
Sibagama hebu, ila ndochikala,
Mkulu Nguluwi nakanzapa ng'hatu,
Nyhumulile lwizi lwa hachi,
Alu ndo lwizi lwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Ndolonga malumbo, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi kwa kunyhidichila,
Iganga lyowalilemile walinguzenga,
ajo ndo mijito ja Mkulu Nguluwi
Ali ndo zuwa lyoyaliditile Mkulu Nguluwi,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, dedede utulohole.
Yatambichizwe ayo yalinguya kwa itagwa lya Mkulu Nguluwi.
Mkulu Nguluwi ndo Nguluwi,
Hegwe ndo Nguluwi wa heni, nani ndangulonga malumbo,
Mlonje malumbo kwa Mkulu Nguluwi kwa vila ka yanojile,
